short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listadum is a shop manager that uses data & AI to improve your sales & revenue for your Etsy shop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an Etsy Seller? This extension is made for you. Improve your browsing experience on Etsy with the Listadum extension and bringing additional, normally hidden, information for all the listings you visit (not only yours!). 

View Listings in Detail: Instantly see detailed statistics for any Etsy listing, including the number of views, favorites, and tags, right on the search results page.

Shop Critique: Start a comprehensive critique of any Etsy shop in one click. The report will analyze the shop performance and identify areas for improvement, effortlessly.
